metadata.description: Professional website creation services and template marketplace.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts or local assets. Ensure 'Clash Display' is available via CDN or file.

grid_system.bento_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6

navbar.behavior: Hide on scroll down, show on scroll up (optional) or always sticky.

hero.alignment: Left aligned text, Visual on right OR Centered text with immersive background.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-[#FF4500] text-white font-semibold hover:scale-105 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-transparent text-white hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors
buttons.floating_whatsapp: Fixed bottom-8 right-8 z-50 bg-[#25D366] text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:scale-110 transition-transform

cards.service_card: bg-neutral-900/50 border border-white/10 p-8 rounded-2xl hover:border-[#FF4500]/50 transition-colors group
cards.template_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-neutral-900
cards.pricing_card: flex flex-col p-8 rounded-2xl border border-white/10 bg-neutral-900/80 hover:border-[#FF4500] transition-colors

forms.input: bg-neutral-900 border-white/10 focus:border-[#FF4500] focus:ring-[#FF4500] h-12 rounded-lg
forms.label: text-sm font-medium text-neutral-400 mb-2 block

guidelines.scroll_behavior: Smooth scrolling with Lenis is MANDATORY.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is readable on dark backgrounds. Use text-neutral-400 for secondary text, not darker.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-[#FF4500]) for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion @studio-freight/lenis clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react @phosphor-icons/react`
2. Configure Tailwind: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and fonts defined above.
3. Create Layout: Build the `Layout` component with the Navbar (including Language Switcher) and Footer.
4. Build Pages: Implement Homepage, Services, Templates, Portfolio, Pricing, Blog, Contact.
5. Components: Use Shadcn UI for complex interactions (Dialog, Select, Accordion) but style them to match the 'Modern Dark' theme.
6. WhatsApp: Add the floating WhatsApp button to the global layout.
7. Midtrans: Prepare the UI for checkout (mock the integration if backend is not ready, but UI must be there).
8. Deployment: Ensure code is clean and ready for GitHub push.
universal_guidelines: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 3+ design references.
Emotion First: Every design decision maps to a feeling.
Content is king: Tell a story.
Zoom in: Use close-ups and bold focus.
Negative Space: Value the empty areas.
Contrast: Use light vs. dark, rough vs. smooth.
